Description.Chinese: Pirates will replace their Mounted Guns with Flak Emplacements temporary if any airhip is nearby.
Description.English: Pirates will replace their Mounted Guns with Flak Emplacements temporary if any airhip is nearby.
Description.French: Pirates will replace their Mounted Guns with Flak Emplacements temporary if any airhip is nearby.
Description.German: Piraten ersetzen ihre Geschützstellungen zeitweise durch Flakstellungen, wenn Luftschiffe in der Nähe sind.
Description.Italian: Pirates will replace their Mounted Guns with Flak Emplacements temporary if any airhip is nearby.
Description.Korean: Pirates will replace their Mounted Guns with Flak Emplacements temporary if any airhip is nearby.
Description.Polish: Pirates will replace their Mounted Guns with Flak Emplacements temporary if any airhip is nearby.
Description.Russian: Pirates will replace their Mounted Guns with Flak Emplacements temporary if any airhip is nearby.
Description.Spanish: Pirates will replace their Mounted Guns with Flak Emplacements temporary if any airhip is nearby.
Description.Taiwanese: Pirates will replace their Mounted Guns with Flak Emplacements temporary if any airhip is nearby.

KnownIssues.Chinese: Does not work on new airhsips added by mods. Does replace also on neutral/allied airships nearby.
KnownIssues.English: Does not work on new airhsips added by mods. Does replace also on neutral/allied airships nearby.
KnownIssues.French: Does not work on new airhsips added by mods. Does replace also on neutral/allied airships nearby.
KnownIssues.German: Funktioniert nicht mit mit durch Mods hinzugefügten Luftschiffen. Ersetzt auch bei neutralen/verbündeten Luftschiffen in der Nähe.
KnownIssues.Italian: Does not work on new airhsips added by mods. Does replace also on neutral/allied airships nearby.
